      • getMethodSignatureBaseString

        public static java.lang.String getMethodSignatureBaseString(int volleyRequestMethod,
                                            java.lang.String uri,
                                            java.lang.String queryParameters)
        Get the signature base string (used in oauth transactions) for the given request.
        Parameters:
        volleyRequestMethod - The method type. Taken from Request.Method.
        uri - The uri (excluding appended query parameters).
        queryParameters - The query parameters to append to the uri.
        Returns:
        Return the signature base string.
